articles.title: Red Sox advance to ALCS after walk-off win over top-seed Rays - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: The Boston Red Sox have advanced to the American League Championship Series after a walk-off win over the Tampa Bay Rays in Game 4 of their division series on Monday.
articles.content: BOSTON -- Kike Hernandez delivered Boston's second straight walk-off win, scoring pinch-runner Danny Santana with a sacrifice fly in the ninth inning to send the Red Sox to the AL Championship Series… [+6477 chars]

articles.author: Will Dunham, Reuters
articles.title: Hearth site in Utah desert reveals human tobacco use 12300 years ago - KSL.com
articles.description: Scientists have unearthed evidence of a milestone in human culture - the earliest-known use of tobacco - in the remnants of a hearth built by early inhabitants of North America's interior about 12,300 years ago in Utah's Great Salt Lake Desert.
